data.name: answer_1
data.value: A: In the Garage, select a vehicle and place the purchased equipment in a free slot to the left of the shell slots.

data.name: answer_10
data.value: A: Determine the enemy's location and position your vehicle so that the bush is between you and the enemy. Do not worry if your vehicle's gun sticks out of the bush, it will not make you more noticeable.

data.name: answer_11
data.value: A: These are the penetration ratings for each different shell type available for that gun.

data.name: answer_12
data.value: A: No, they will not disappear and will continue in effect, although they will not be increased until the crew member's level is 100% again.

data.name: answer_13
data.value: A: Yes. You will benefit from both.

data.name: answer_14
data.value: A: Center the reticle indicator on the enemy vehicle and click the right mouse button.

data.name: answer_15
data.value: A: Press and hold the right mouse button to look around without turning your turret.

data.name: answer_16
data.value: A: It weakens off-armor effect of High-Explosive shell if the shell has not penetrated the armor.

data.name: answer_17
data.value: A: User support center: https://na.wargaming.net/support/ https://eu.wargaming.net/support/ https://asia.wargaming.net/support/ https://kr.wargaming.net/support/

data.name: answer_2
data.value: A: Right-click the vehicle, select "Sell", and demount all the equipment.

data.name: answer_3
data.value: A: A player does not have a tier, but a vehicle does. You can see the tier of each vehicle at the bottom part of the Garage: a Roman numeral at the upper left corner on the vehicle icon.

data.name: answer_4
data.value: A: No. The Rammer, Gun Laying Drive, and Stabilizer are mounted on the vehicle and stay there even if the gun is replaced.

data.name: answer_5
data.value: A: Press Shift to enable/disable SPG Artillery mode.

data.name: answer_6
data.value: A: To select a shell type, left-click on the required shell type in the Service bar.

data.name: answer_7
data.value: A: A Camouflage Net is mounted on only one vehicle at a time. It becomes effective five seconds after the vehicle stops moving. A Camouflage Net is not used up in battle, and can be freely moved from vehicle to vehicle.

data.name: answer_8
data.value: A: No, a Fire Extinguisher disappears only if it is used in a battle.

data.name: answer_9
data.value: A: Light tanks are designed to detect enemy vehicles. Scouts can often perform their mission without attempting to engage the enemy.

data.name: question_1
data.value: Q: I have purchased equipment in the Store. How do I mount it on my vehicle?

data.name: question_10
data.value: Q: What is the best way to use bushes to hide?

data.name: question_11
data.value: Q: What is the meaning of the penetration numbers in the gun characteristics, for example, "112/189/29"?

data.name: question_12
data.value: Q: If I send a crew member to another vehicle, will additional skills disappear?

data.name: question_13
data.value: Q: If I purchase a Premium Account and a premium vehicle at the same time, will I benefit from both of them?

data.name: question_14
data.value: Q: How do I enable Auto-Aim?

data.name: question_15
data.value: Q: How do I look around without rotating the turret?

data.name: question_16
data.value: Q: What is the benefit of a Spall Liner?

data.name: question_17
data.value: Q: Whom do I contact for technical and financial issues?

data.name: question_2
data.value: Q: How do I sell a vehicle?

data.name: question_3
data.value: Q: What is my tier?

data.name: question_4
data.value: Q: Will my tank's Rammer, Gun Laying Drive, and Stabilizer be destroyed when I replace the vehicle's gun?

data.name: question_5
data.value: Q: How do I enable/disable SPG Artillery mode?

data.name: question_6
data.value: Q: How do I select a shell type before the battle?

data.name: question_7
data.value: Q: If I purchase a Camouflage Net, will it be compatible with all my vehicles? Will it disappear after the battle?

data.name: question_8
data.value: Q: Do Fire Extinguishers disappear after the battle?

data.name: question_9
data.value: Q: Why is my light tank always matched against higher tier vehicles that I can't even damage?

data.name: answer_17/contains_links
data.value: A: {openSupportURL[openTag]:s}User Support Center{openSupportURL[closeTag]:s}
